content:
Sure, here are some niche websites and specialty shops that you may find useful for unique or hard-to-find components for your VR gaming PC build:

1. PCPartPicker.com: PCPartPicker allows you to select the components you need and compares prices from various retailers. It can help you find the best deals and availability for the components you need.

2. Superbiiz.com: Superbiiz is an online retailer that specializes in computer hardware, software, and accessories. They offer a wide range of products, including hard-to-find and discontinued items.

3. Reddit.com/r/buildapcsales: This subreddit is dedicated to finding and sharing deals on PC components and accessories. You can find some great deals on unique or hard-to-find components.

4. Performance-PCs.com: Performance PCs is an online store that specializes in high-performance computer hardware, including water cooling systems, modding parts, and other unique items.

5. FrozenCPU.com: FrozenCPU is another online store that specializes in computer hardware and modding parts for custom PC builds. They offer a wide range of unique and hard-to-find components.

It's important to remember that some niche websites or specialty shops may have limited availability, higher prices, or longer delivery times than larger retailers. Always do your research and compare prices and reviews before making a purchase.
